name: RESIDENT EVIL 0
description:
RESIDENT EVIL 0 is Survival Round Base Game . Find Guns Kill Zombies Earn Money  And Buy Guns And Other Equipment's.

key:-

W -> Move Forward .

A->Move Left.

S->Move Backward.

D->Move Right.

E->Equip Weapon

Left Mouse Button-> Aim

Right Mouse Button ->Fire

Spacebar -> Jump

And Also Find The Area Where You Get MAXAMMO.

Enjoy....
